text:
AirFox | Front-end, Back-end, Android, Data Science, Blockchain, Ethereum | Onsite Boston, MA, USA and Switzerland (Zug or remote worker, but must be Swiss Resident) | Full Time

AirFox makes mobile data and airtime more affordable for low income people in the USA and emerging markets. We are actively hiring developers for a range of positions. If you are located in Boston or Switzerland, please reach out, we would love to discuss further.

Please see http://airfox.io/ for more information, and contact me at james@airfox.io
